settings.title: Perfect Display for PACS and Teleradiology
settings.html:
This high-brightness color monitor for diagnosis is perfect for accurate displaying of grayscale tones as well as color images in the medical environment. The monitor accepts multiple input signals from both state-of-the-art and legacy systems. Its high contrast creates the perfect fit for most grayscale modalities and imaging systems. Typical application areas are endoscopy, cardiology, and ultrasound.

  • Five precalibrated 10-bit look-up tables are selectable for diverse modalities and viewing environments.
  • Freely adjustable user lookup table allowing users to set their own preferences.
  • Color slider for color adjustment in the field without the loss of grayscale tones.
  • Grayscale tones were adjusted in the factory to meet the DICOM Part 14 standard for optimum viewing of DICOM images.
  • Force Mode for tailoring the monitor to even the most specialized timing requirements. Wide range of input support.

settings.title: Perfect Image Reproduction thanks to IPS LCD Technology
settings.content: The LCD technology used eliminates picture geometry distortions and color spots. The monitor delivers flicker-free images, even at low refresh rates (60 Hz). In addition, the IPS panel of the monitor guarantees improved contrast values and significantly higher viewing angle stability. The result is a device that meets the highest ergonomic requirements.

settings.title: Dual-Screen Display on One Monitor
settings.content: With Picture-by-Picture (PbyP) or Picture-in-Picture (PinP) functions, two screens from separate input signals can be displayed simultaneously on one monitor. A bezel-less widescreen enables simplified and flexible operation.

settings.title: Constant Luminance Regulation
settings.content: An integrated brightness sensor, using EIZO fully automated brightness control, ensures fast luminance stabilization during system start and compensates for fluctuations that occur in the course of operation due to different ambient temperatures.

settings.title: Installation of a VESA Ceiling Suspension
settings.content: Compliance with the VESA standard enables attachment to existing mounting accessories.

settings.title: Environmentally-Friendly LED Backlight
settings.content: By utilizing an energy-efficient LED as a backlight, the monitor achieves good brightness values with low power consumption. In contrast to conventional CCFL technology, LED backlighting offers a longer monitor lifespan, is free of hazardous materials, and is therefore compliant with current environmental regulations.

settings.title: Consistency with DICOM Part 14 Calibration
settings.html: The monitor is precalibrated to meet the DICOM Part 14 standard, thereby ensuring permanently consistent image transmission. The five default look-up tables (LUTs) contain practice-based settings. They take into account the DIN 6868-157 room classes, thereby meeting current specifications for diagnostic monitors.

settings.title: Support of Complex Timing Requirements
settings.html: Although the monitor automatically detects standard video signals, older medical devices frequently cause problems due to their unusual timing. These special application requirements can be met using the Force Mode function.

settings.title: Freely Adjustable User Lookup Table (LUT)
settings.html: The adjustable LUT makes it possible for LUT recalculations to be initiated manually. Within this recalculation, the gamma model, luminance settings, or color parameters can be modified. The LUT is calculated via the OSD menu without having to access external calibration software. The reset LUT is calculated immediately, saved in the device, and used immediately for image display. This provides the user with the ability to establish the user LUT individually without using a luminance meter. .

settings.title: Display of Different Signal Resolutions
settings.html: The optimum screen resolution is 1280 x 1024 pixels. Video signals with other resolutions, common in medical technology, are automatically adapted to the screen size. Alternatively, they can be displayed in their original size (1:1).

settings.title: Cascading Multiple Monitors
settings.html: The integrated Loop-Through output (BNC video / SoG signal) enables connection with multiple other monitors or image archiving in the operating room.

settings.title: Versatile Positioning for Improved Ergonomics
settings.html: EIZO's highly versatile stand offers tilt, swivel, and a wide height adjustment range enabling you to use the monitor with greater comfort.

settings.title: Customer Assurance with Medical Standards
settings.html: The monitor meets the high requirements of international medical safety and EMC standards.
